Build ID: I20070503-1400

Steps To Reproduce:
1. I created a Hello World RCP and made a product.
2. When I want to export the product, it fails with an Error (Reason: Problems during export / Details: BUILD FAILED java.lang.IllegalArgumentException)
3. If I try it with 3.3M6, it works.


More information:
I added some branding (default Icons, that come with the Hello World RCP).

I tried again with the "-consoleLog" Parameter...

The product export works fine for me. Could you please provide us with a detailed setup (or even an archive) to reproduce the problem. Thx.

Created an attachment (id=66812)
Complete project, that fails to export a product on my machine.

Attached you find the project, that fails to export the product on my machine.

Setup on my machine
-------------------
OS: Windows XP Professional SP2. English/International Version with german language pack (company version).
Computer: IBM ThinkPad R50, Pentium M 1.5 GHz, 768 MB Ram
Java: 1.5.0_09
Eclipse: Freshly downloaded - "out of the box".

If you need any more info, just contact me.

Thanks for the example. I have tried it and the export completes successfully. Make sure that you have not installed M7 over an M6 install without deleting M6 before. Moving to the Ant component because the stack track indicates something in that space.

This is a bug in the Ant 1.7.0 release if attempting to run a build in a location that has spaces in the path.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 183283 ***
